code: import ExponentAV from'./ExponentAV';import{requestFullscreen,exitFullscreen}from'./FullscreenUtils.web';export default{get ScaleNone(){return'none';},get ScaleToFill(){return'fill';},get ScaleAspectFit(){return'contain';},get ScaleAspectFill(){return'cover';},async setFullscreen(element,isFullScreenEnabled){if(isFullScreenEnabled){await requestFullscreen(element);}else{await exitFullscreen(element);}return ExponentAV.getStatusForVideo(element);}};
